name: succubi_whip
description: Dummy item used for monster attack.  If you see this, then something went wrong.
Shoots coom.  If you're seeing this, it's a bug.
This sticky viscous liquid obviously belonged to a non-human being.  Drinking it might cause mutations.
This is a scraped out demon filth, taken from yourself.  You can drop it to clean it from yourself, or maybe try gathering them for its corruptive nature
Someone who know their ways around demonic sex rites might find some use out of this, but not you.

name: schoolgirl uniform
description: An upper garment with a peculiar collar and torso design.  It is popular worldwide from the late 19th century to the early 20th century, and is wildly spread in cosplay culture as well as being used as a uniform for female students in Japan.

name: paper cartridge (magic bullet)
description: A paper cartridge containing black powder and a metallic projectile.  The projectile itself is covered with magic pattern.  It is said that every shot will always hit what you desire, however the last one will hit what you don't want the most.  After hitting its first target, the projectile will then ricochet at the next target.

//: ID retained to avoid any weirdness.
description: A contract of demonic make, written upon parchment.  Reading its content loudly will bring forth a goathead demon, to call upon and bound upon a covenant.  Your chance of success will depend on how well you could negotiate a contract with them.

use_action.friendly_msg: The demon looks down at you imperiously, as if waiting for your  questions.
use_action.hostile_msg: The goathead demon looks down at you imperiously, wroth written upon its face for your impudence!

//: ID retained to avoid any weirdness.
description: A contract of demonic make, written upon parchment.  Reading its content loudly will bring forth a goathead demon, to call upon and bound upon a covenant.  Your chance of success will depend on how well you could negotiate a contract with them.

use_action.friendly_msg: The demon looks down at you imperiously, as if waiting for your  ministration.
use_action.hostile_msg: The demon looks down at you in a cruel smirk, their lust apparent as they reach for your body!

//: ID retained to avoid any weirdness.
description: A contract of demonic make, written upon parchment.  Reading its content loudly will bring forth a lactating succubus, to call upon and bound upon a covenant.  Your chance of success will depend on how well you could negotiate a contract with them.

use_action.friendly_msg: The demon looks down at you and smirk, as if daring you to touch her.
use_action.hostile_msg: The demon looks down at you imperiously, wroth written upon its face for your impudence calling them!

description: This is a scroll, with unfamiliar scripts written upon images of hellish creatures under orgy of death, rapine fest, and murder.  Using this contract, it might be possible to bind demonic creatures to your will, either permanently or temporarily, you don't know.  The sudden impact of projecting your mind with such infernal magick will painfully stun and singe you, however.
This is a goop of demonic semen *inside* you. You can try to clean it off from yourself.

use_action.msg: You scooped it out from yourself.
use_action.need_charges_msg: Not enough soap to cleanse off the filth.

description: This is a goop of demonic semen *inside* you. You can try to clean it off from yourself.

use_action.msg: You fail to scoop it out from yourself.
use_action.need_charges_msg: Not enough soap to cleanse off the filth.

description: This is a demonic gestation, a mockery of human pregnancy growing upon your flesh. Its unnaturalness inflicts you with the utmost unwholesome growth, like a tumorous growth. Always moving. Crawling in your torso like a maggot.
//: was 1 item w 9 charge, now separated in 3. Turn/charge is da same tho.

description: A pregnancy come to full term. Activate to give birth.
